privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Rawdah ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, and shares information about you when you use our mobile application and website.

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.content:
We collect minimal information to provide our services:

- **Account Information**: If you create an account, we collect your email address and display name.
- **Usage Data**: We collect information about how you use the app, including progress data and quiz results.
- **Device Information**: We may collect device type, operating system, and app version for troubleshooting purposes.

section2.title: How We Use Your Information
section2.content:
We use the information we collect to:

- Provide, maintain, and improve our services
- Sync your progress across devices
- Send you updates about the app (if you opt-in)
- Respond to your feedback and support requests

section3.title: Data Storage
section3.content: Your progress data is stored locally on your device and optionally synced to our secure cloud servers if you create an account. We use Firebase for authentication and data storage, which complies with industry-standard security practices.

section4.title: Data Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. We may share data with service providers who assist us in operating the app, subject to confidentiality agreements.

section5.title: Your Rights
section5.content:
You have the right to:

- Access your personal data
- Request deletion of your account and data
- Opt-out of promotional communications
- Export your progress data

section6.title: Contact Us
section6.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the feedback form in the app or on our website.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: Welcome to Rawdah. By using our application, you agree to these Terms of Use. Please read them carefully.

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing or using Rawdah, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the application.

section2.title: Description of Service
section2.content:
Rawdah is an educational application designed to help users learn and memorize the 99 Names of Allah (Asmaul Husna). The app provides:

- Audio pronunciations
- Translations and meanings
- Interactive quizzes
- Progress tracking features

section3.title: User Accounts
section3.content:
Some features may require creating an account. You are responsible for:

- Maintaining the confidentiality of your account
- All activities that occur under your account
- Providing accurate and complete information

section4.title: Acceptable Use
section4.content:
You agree not to:

- Use the app for any unlawful purpose
- Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
- Interfere with or disrupt the service
- Copy, modify, or distribute app content without permission

section5.title: Intellectual Property
section5.content: The app and its content, including but not limited to text, audio, graphics, and code, are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. Audio recordings are used with proper licensing.

section6.title: Disclaimer
section6.content: The app is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the app will be error-free or uninterrupted. Religious content is provided for educational purposes.

section7.title: Changes to Terms
section7.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

section8.title: Contact
section8.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us through the feedback form.
